title: Why can't I use Facebook messenger chat heads in landscape mode since the android 11 update?
content:
I have tried contacting Facebook support, I've updated my Facebook messenger app. I still can't use the chatheads while my phone is in landscape mode. I will add a link to a screen recording to show what I mean. Please fix this issue soon, if it were a problem with the app itself, it would have been sorted by now. 
https://photos.app.goo.gl/vCJTcTCeSLNfmNBT9
